sourcesContent:
No movies registered

 import { ActivatedRoute, Router, RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { MovieService } from './../movie.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../movie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { movieList: Movie[] = []; constructor( private service: MovieService, private router: Router ){} ngOnInit() : void{ this.service.getMovies().subscribe((movieList) => { this.movieList = movieList; }); } OnEditMovie(id: number): void{ this.router.navigate([`/movies/edit/${id}`]); } OnDeleteMovie(id: number){ if(confirm("Do you really wanna delete this movie?")){ this.service.deleteMovies(id).subscribe(); } else{ alert("not confirmed"); } } }
